snippet: European data protection officials are drafting plans to censure Google over its online privacy policy if the company does not eventually meet regulators' demands to revise it.
abstract: European data protection officials are drafting plans to censure Google over its online privacy policy if the company does not meet regulators' demands to revise it.
lead_paragraph: European data protection officials are drafting plans to censure Google over its online privacy policy if the company does not eventually meet regulators' demands to revise it.

headline.seo: European Panel Is Pressuring Google on Privacy Rules
headline.main: Dismayed at Google’s Privacy Policy, European Group Is Weighing Censure
headline.print_headline: Dismayed at Google’s Privacy Policy, European Group Is Weighing Censure
